package.name: ExtremeProLight
package.description: This is the light version of ExtremeProDark.This theme resets the Alias colors in spreadsheets to the default yellow. But a Restart is recuired.

preferencepack.name: ExtremeProlight
preferencepack.description: This is the light version of ExtremeProDark.This theme resets the Alias colors in spreadsheets to the default yellow. But a Restart is recuired.
